document_data.name: Duladora Trameldor
document_data.mainbody: '''Duladora Trameldor''' was a [[half-elf]] in [[Sildëyuir]] in [[1372 DR]].
document_data.History: Duladora lived in the [[Yuirwood]] with her father [[Berask Trameldor]]. In 1372 DR, she was near the ''[[portal]]'' to the [[Night Realm]] so the [[nilshai]] [[Tolg'byri]] ordered its mercenaries to kidnap Duladora with the objective of using her [[star elf]] heritage to unlock the mysteries of Sildëyuir. The [[yochlol]] [[Savera]] instead planned to turn her in a [[drider]] under her orders.
document_data.Personality: Duladora was totally scared by Tolg'byri and only wanted to go back home.
